detailsData.title: Client Focused
detailsData.content: Eckhaus Law is devoted exclusively to residential real estate transactions. This sole representation of buyers and sellers of residential property is a first among law firms in the greater New York Area.

detailsData.title: Experience
detailsData.content: Robyn Eckhaus has been on all sides of the business, as a transactional real estate attorney, founder and general counsel of a title insurance agency, and real estate broker. For over 30 years—and with $2 billion of successfully closed real estate transactions—Robyn Eckhaus is ready to focus on her passion.

detailsData.title: Expertise
detailsData.content: Robyn offers comprehensive, flexible services that can be tailored to your exact needs, from remote and electronic solutions to detailed, personalized advice on every aspect of your transaction. Her wealth of experience and deep understanding of New York real estate law set her apart.

detailsData.title: Empathy
detailsData.content: At Eckhaus Law, empathy is as important as professional expertise. They’re two sides of the same coin, both necessary for effective communication and collaboration.

address: 387 Park Avenue South, 5th Floor, New York, NY 10016
valueProp: Eckhaus Law is devoted exclusively to residential real estate transactions. This sole representation of buyers and sellers of residential property is a first among law firms in the greater New York Area. Because of its unique firm model, Eckhaus Law can offer deep expertise, personalized service, and a better attorney-client experience from start to finish.

testimonalData.text: Robyn is an exceptional attorney who truly cares about her clients.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: Eckhaus Law made my home buying process seamless and stress-free.

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend Robyn for any residential real estate needs.
